content:
/>
II.iii.1.A.4.d
.
Identifying an Incomplete Application
Consider an application
incomplete
if it is signed but the claimant has not provided all the information described in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.C
.
Reference
:  For more information on the criteria for a substantially complete application, see
38 CFR 3.160(a)
and
38 CFR 3.159(a)(3)
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - Applications for Benefits
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
